title: Burns and Scalds
body:
- **Burn:** Dry heat (oven, grill, hot pan).
- **Scald:** Wet heat (steam, boiling water, hot oil).

**Treatment:** Cool the burn under cool running water for at least 20 minutes. Do not apply ice, butter, or creams. Cover with cling film if severe and seek medical help.

title: Cuts and Bleeding
body:
- **Minor cuts:** Clean, dry, and apply a blue plaster.
- **Severe bleeding:** Apply direct pressure with a clean cloth/dressing. Raise the injured limb above heart level if possible. Call 999 if bleeding won't stop.

title: First Aid Arrangements
body:
Your workplace must have:
- A stocked First Aid kit (green box).
- An Appointed Person (someone in charge of the kit).
- Information on who the First Aiders are.

All accidents must be recorded in the Accident Book.

prompt: Order the steps for treating a burn.

title: Module Complete
body: You now know basic first aid response. Remember: Cool burns, pressure on cuts, and report every accident.
